TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RenderOptions extends System.Object
public ref class RenderOptions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于控制对象的呈现行为的选项。

span.span: Provides options for controlling the rendering behavior of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用的附加的属性类 WPF 应用程序中指定的文本和可视元素的呈现选项。You can use the attached properties of the class to specify options for the rendering of text and visual elements in your WPF application. 这些选项使您能够优化速度或质量的呈现。These options enable you to optimize rendering for speed or quality.

.property valuetype System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode ProcessRenderMode
Public Shared Property ProcessRenderMode As RenderMode
public: static property System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode ProcessRenderMode { System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Interop::RenderMode value); };

summary.span: 指定当前进程的呈现模式首选项。

span.span: Specifies the render mode preference for the current process.

value.span: 当前进程的 首选项。

span.span: The preference for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以强制对当前进程的软件呈现。Use the property to force software rendering for the current process. 你可以避免许多呈现问题的 WPF 应用程序中发生，并且，由外部的问题，如果更改软件呈现到首选项。You can avoid many rendering issues that occur in WPF applications and that are caused by external issues if you change your preference to software rendering. 应用程序在启动期间，如果你的应用程序检测到的呈现问题，例如较慢的帧速率，你可以设置呈现模式为仅软件。During application startup, if your application detects rendering issues, such as slow frame rates, you can set the rendering mode to software only. 此外，你可能想要启用用户设置，应用程序运行时。Also, you may want to enable the user setting while the application is running. 首选项替代设置。The preference overrides the setting. 软件呈现的优先顺序是：The precedence order for software rendering is: 1. DisableHWAcceleration 注册表项DisableHWAcceleration registry key 2. 3. （每个目标） (per-target) **请注意**指定首选项并不一定更改的实际呈现模式。**Note** specifies a preference and does not necessarily change the actual rendering mode. 对系统其他部分可以忽略此首选项，并强制系统使用软件呈现。Other parts of the system may override this preference and force the system into software rendering.

span.span: to set this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法或对位图进行动画处理的子代。Use the method on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过设置属性对象传递给，你可以缩放位图时创建平滑的动画。By setting the property of the object to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置为对象。The following example shows how to set the for an object. [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet2)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet2)]

param.name: target

summary.span: 设置指定的依赖对象上的 附加属性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property on a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态的情况下，其中既不内容，也不使用场景中的画笔正在更改时，不缓存提供一个好处，因为它可以节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法，默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容的每一帧，即使内容都是不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转三维对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加到的画笔属性，你可以通过使用缓存的版本的平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 和属性值是相对大小值来确定何时将应由于缩放比例的更改重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 2.0 中，缓存中用于需要仅在其大小超过两次当前缓存的大小重新生成。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 使用此方法设置附加在代码中的属性。Use this method to set the attached property in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存的提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

span.span: The specified is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本对象始终显示使用抗锯齿和都不会影响设置的边缘模式值。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 当你设置的视觉对象的边缘模式值时的视觉对象的所有子代绘图基元设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以设置到的视觉对象的边缘模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a visual object to . [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

span.span: The specified is .
